titleStmt.title: The loyal non-conformist, or, The religious subject, yielding to God his due, and to Cæsar his right being a discourse from the pulpit touching true gospel worship and due subjection to magistrates / now printed, as it was preached (for the most part) in the month of August, 1662, by T.P.P---N-C.
titleStmt.author: T. P., P---N-C.

titleStmt.title: The loyal non-conformist, or, The religious subject, yielding to God his due, and to Cæsar his right being a discourse from the pulpit touching true gospel worship and due subjection to magistrates / now printed, as it was preached (for the most part) in the month of August, 1662, by T.P.P---N-C.
titleStmt.author: T. P., P---N-C.

notesStmt.note: Wing (2nd ed.) gives author as Thomas Palk.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Dr. Williams' Library.
True gospel-worship -- Cæsar's right, or, The subject's duty, due to subjection.
